description: The sausage filling inside these Maltese pastry treats combine well with the soft beans.
keywords: Pasta,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Pastizzi with Sausage & Broad Beans Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium white onion, peeled and diced

recipeInstructions.text: Heat up a non-stick pan and fry the onion, garlic, beans and sausage meat for 7 minutes and remove from the heat.
Once the fried ingredients have cooled slightly, place in a bowl with the rest of the ingredients apart from the pastry.
Roll out the pastry and cut out about 16 circles using a circular glass or cup.
Place a little of the mixture into the centre of the circle, fold up the edges and pinch together tightly.
Place the sealed pastizzis on a baking tray and bake for 20 minutes before serving.
